attributes.action: to punish the perpetrators of violent crimes more severely
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for those who support more severe punishments for those who commit crimes of a violent nature, especially acts of "random violence" and that those under the age of 18 committing acts of a violent nature be tried as adults, if you feel that "if they can commit an adult crime they can serve and adult scentence" then please sign this petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
